document_data.name: Gate of Lions
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gate of Lions''' was found in the city of [[Muluk]] in the [[Free Cities of Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Location: The Gate of Lions was located on the western wall of the city. It opened to a garden right before the Royal Lagoon within Muluk and led to the docks.
document_data.Description: A pair of [[lion]]s was carved into the framework of the gate, giving the portal its name.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Gate of Lions was a fortress as much as it was an entryway into Muluk. It housed 200 soldiers.
